Class MonochromeColor

java.lang.Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ControllerProperty
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.snmp.ASN1Object
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.snmp.ASN1OctetString
us.mn.state.dot.tms.server.comm.ntcip.mib1203.MonochromeColor
public class MonochromeColor extends ASN1OctetString
Color of LEDs on a monochrome sign. This object was added in 1203v2.
Author:
Douglas Lau
